name: Tanzio
tag_list: advertising, lead-generation, local, local-search, service-provider, smb, price-quotes, appointment-scheduling
description: If you post it, they will come
overview:
Tanzio is the exact opposite of the way you’re used to finding things. Consumers go to Tanzio.com, post one request, and instantly receive multiple replies and offers from the business community.

Lists… You’ve seen these before on: Google, Yahoo, Yelp, Yellow Pages, etc. Any time you search for something, either online or off, you get a list. Frankly, we’re sick and tired of lists. Let’s say you need a Dentist. How do you go about getting one? Google it? Sure thing, and they’ll give you a list of Dentists that you then have to call. Wouldn’t it be easier if you could just post an ad for what you need, and have the Dentists call you. That’s exactly what Tanzio does. No more searching. No more calling. Just post one request, sit back and let the businesses come to you!
